articles.title: Over 160 Dead, Russia-Led Troops In: Here's Why Kazakhstan Is On The Boil - NDTV
articles.description: More than 160 people were reported Sunday to have died in several days of unrest in Kazakhstan and almost 6,000 have been arrested after riots in Central Asia's largest country.
articles.content:
Kazakhstan Unrest: Security forces in Kazakhstan killed over 160 protesters.

articles.description: Bitcoin topped $42,500 on Sunday after reaching its lowest mark since late September the day before; ether reaches over $3,200.
